channel.title: Monsters dropping 50-100 of a certain item?
channel.description: Is there anyway to make it so when you kill a monster instead of always dropping 50 for example of a certain item, they drop 50-100?

item.title: Monsters dropping 50-100 of a certain item?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

daone8:

So for the %%%% I would put 50-105 for example?

Oh… thats for a specific amount like 75. I’m sorry idk how to make a range. :S

Read full topic

item.source: Monsters dropping 50-100 of a certain item?

item.title: Monsters dropping 50-100 of a certain item?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

Open NPCHandler.java and follow this format.

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####) { ItemHandler.addItem($$$$, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, %%%%, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }
Replace the #### with the NPC ID.
Replace the $$$$ with the Item ID
Replace the %%%% with the amount of that item.

Read full topic
